context: to maintain professional portfolio with categorized work samples, project documentation, and case studies
description: Portfolio organization and maintenance task for design, development, and creative professionals. Includes categorizing completed projects, updating project documentation, creating case studies, organizing files in structured folders, and maintaining portfolio website or Notion database. Essential for client presentations, job applications, and team showcase.
estimated_duration: 2 hours (45 min organization + 45 min documentation + 30 min updates)
dependencies: Portfolio platform access (Notion, Behance, personal website)
Client permission for portfolio use (if needed)
success_criteria: All completed projects categorized by type/industry
Project files organized in structured folder hierarchy
Case studies created for top 5-10 projects
Portfolio database updated with latest work
Project descriptions written with impact metrics
Easy to filter and search projects

steps.name: Collect and inventory completed projects
outputs: List of all completed projects (last 6-12 months)

steps.name: Create folder structure and organize files
outputs: Folder hierarchy created (by project type, date, client)
Project files moved to appropriate folders
Archive folder created for old/inactive projects

steps.name: Categorize projects and add metadata
outputs: Projects tagged by category (branding, web design, video, etc.)

steps.name: Develop case studies for top projects
Update portfolio database and website
outputs: New projects added to portfolio website

checklist.item: Folder structure created and files organized
Project descriptions written for all key projects
Case studies created for top 3-5 projects
Portfolio reviewed and ready for presentations

roi_metrics.client_acquisition: Well-organized portfolio increases client conversion by 50%
roi_metrics.time_efficiency: Saves 1-2 hours per client pitch with ready-to-present portfolio
